text: $(br)$(#bd951a)Special: $()$(#ff0000)Smacks the non-flying nut directly in front of it. Turn page for details.

$(br)$(#bd951a)Loco Coco's motive for only smacking nuts around is a mystery. Is he just a self- appointed nut tyrant? Does he hate nuts so much he removed 'nut' from his name? Does he show love in a twisted way? IS HE NUTS!?!? We will never know.
$(br)$(#bd951a)Condition: $()$(#ff0000)6 or more Zombies in Targeting Range.
$(br)$(#bd951a)Special: $()$(#ff0000)Heavy Damage. Rolls around, turning some degrees to the left or right after hitting a Zombie.
$(br)$(#bd951a)Damage Radius: $()$(#ff0000)Low Profile. 2.5 Blocks, center is 1.5 blocks in front.
$(br)$(#bd951a)Projectile Range: $()$(#ff0000)15 Blocks. Roll hitbox is 3 Blocks wide.
$(br)$(#bd951a)Special: $()$(#ff0000)Heavy Damage. Roll if Peanut's HP is above half, Lobbed otherwise.
$(br)$(#bd951a)Special: $()$(#ff0000)Heavy Damage. Bowling if Peanut's HP is above half, Lobbed otherwise.

pages.title: References
text: $(br)$(#bd951a)Plants vs. Zombies: Battle for Neighborville: $()$(#ff0000)Roll for Damage
